name: Incarnatia
description: This Japanese game is a fusion of art and games in one place. It involves the 20th century painter Salvador Dali. With his own interpretation, CG artist Shimo Hirokazu has his mysterious art world rebuilt into a three-dimensional world. The player's legs peek through the paintings like windows, but that's not the only abyss. For example, there's the soft watch from the famous 'Persistence of Memory' painting. When turned on, players will see what there will be to be done in this strange adventure game. (
